page.title: 09A Village Housewife
page.content: Mrs. Gatehouse has lived in West Buckland for seventeen years.She moved from a town in Essex and prefers it here because of the community.She finds the people here more friendly. The Open University,dancing and sport are her main interests,but she does not have much spare time because she has to look after her four children. She shops in Barnstaple because of its wider selection of products unlike the village store. The North Devon link road does not bother her because she feels the area needs better links with the rest of the country. She has no difficulty in travelling because she has a large car. Her husband teaches at West Buckland School and she has two children there. Clare Hawkins
